availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. S. Wood (Christian County farmer)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary Wood. Father of Mary Wood, George Wood, James Wood, Nannie Wood, and Susan Wood. Farmer in Christian County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Unnamed District, p. 6; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Fruit Hill Precinct, Hopkinsville post office, p. 29.
